Objective To determine safety early mobilization physical and/or occupational therapy acute ischemic stroke patient within 24-hours IV-tPA infusion examine early mobilization lead shorten ICU hospital length stay . Methods Prospective study incidence adverse response functional mobility status study patient mobilize occupational and/or physical therapy 12- 24 hour IV-tPA infusion comparison ICU hospital Length Stay data study group pre-study patient mobilize occupational and/or physical therapy service pre-determined time IV-tPA infusion . Additionally , patient contact study personnel approximately 3 5-days 30-days post-infusion completion Modified Rankin Scale stroke disability survey follow stroke recovery . Setting Medical surgical intensive care unit Mayo Clinic Florida . Patients All patient acute ischemic stroke receive intravenous tissue plasminogen activator ( IV-tPA ) infusion , survive discharge hospital , hemodynamically stable , mobilized physical and/or occupational therapy within 24 hour post-tPA infusion .
